message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. My asking price is $1,150,000, reflecting its unique benefits and potential. I'm confident we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to my business.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. While I appreciate your offer, $950,000 doesn't quite reflect the product's full value. Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This price recognizes both the product's benefits and the value it will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $1,050,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,025,000. I believe this price is more in line with the product's value to my business.
